channel.description: Validate your ID tokens Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Placed under “Secure” because it is verifying the Token Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Convert this doc from an “explanation” to a how-to. Currently, it reads like an explanation but it’s not specific like a how-to Update title Links to original docs: - Validate ID Tokens: https://developer.
